Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: இன்னா எனத்தான் உணர்ந்தவை துன்னாமைவேண்டும் பிறன்கண் செயல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Let not a man consent to do those things to another which, he knows, will cause sorrow.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person has a clear, painful memory of something that caused them sorrow ('இன்னா எனத் தான் உணர்ந்தவை'). This memory is a sharp, red, thorny object in their mind.
Layered_Composition.Midground: They are now in a position where they have the opportunity to do the very same harmful act to another person ('பிறன்கண் செயல்').
Layered_Composition.Background: Because of their own memory of the pain, they make a conscious and determined choice to not even approach that action ('துன்னாமை வேண்டும்'). They are shown building a wall between themselves and the harmful deed, using the very thorns of their own painful memory as the building blocks of their compassionate restraint.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: That which you have personally experienced as painful is the very thing you must resolve never to do to others.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The memory of pain as a thorny object is key. The use of these same thorns to build a wall of restraint is a powerful metaphor for turning one's own suffering into a source of empathy and virtue.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Empathetic, principled, compassionate, learning from suffering.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A clear, thoughtful light. The memory of pain is a sharp, vivid red. The wall of restraint that is built from it is a complex but ultimately protective structure. The person's expression is one of deep, learned empathy.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that visualizes the person's inner world, showing the memory of pain and the conscious act of using that memory to build a moral barrier.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a focus on the symbolic architecture of the 'wall of restraint'.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The painful memory is a harsh light, but the act of restraint transforms it into a softer, more virtuous glow.

Cultural_Anchors: The things one has known as painful (இன்னா எனத் தான் உணர்ந்தவை)
One must resolve not to do them to another (துன்னாமை வேண்டும் பிறன்கண் செயல்)
